      • cookieNameMatches

        public static ru.tinkoff.qa.neptune.core.api.steps.Criteria<org.openqa.selenium.Cookie> cookieNameMatches​(java.lang.String expression)
        The checking of a browser cookie.
        Parameters:
        expression - is a substring of text that a cookie name is supposed to have. It is possible to pass reg exp pattern that name of a cookie should fit.
        Returns:
        criteria that checks/filters a browser cookie
        See Also:
        Cookie.getName()

      • cookieIsSecure

        public static ru.tinkoff.qa.neptune.core.api.steps.Criteria<org.openqa.selenium.Cookie> cookieIsSecure()
        The checking of a browser cookie. It is used to filter secure cookies. The sample below shows how to make inverted criteria

        NOT(cookieIsSecure())

        Returns:
        criteria that checks/filters a browser cookie
        See Also:
        Cookie.isSecure(), Criteria.NOT(Criteria[])

      • cookieIsHttpOnly

        public static ru.tinkoff.qa.neptune.core.api.steps.Criteria<org.openqa.selenium.Cookie> cookieIsHttpOnly()
        The checking of a browser cookie. It is used to filter http-only cookies. The sample below shows how to make inverted criteria

        NOT(cookieIsHttpOnly())

        Returns:
        criteria that checks/filters a browser cookie
        See Also:
        Cookie.isHttpOnly(), Criteria.NOT(Criteria[])

      • cookieExpiry

        public static ru.tinkoff.qa.neptune.core.api.steps.Criteria<org.openqa.selenium.Cookie> cookieExpiry​(java.util.Date dateExpiry)
        The checking of a browser cookie. It is used to filter cookies by expiry date.
        Parameters:
        dateExpiry - is expected expiry date
        Returns:
        criteria that checks/filters a browser cookie
        See Also:
        Cookie.getExpiry()

      • cookieExpiryBefore

        public static ru.tinkoff.qa.neptune.core.api.steps.Criteria<org.openqa.selenium.Cookie> cookieExpiryBefore​(java.util.Date before)
        The checking of a browser cookie. It is used to filter cookies by expiry date.
        Parameters:
        before - is upper border of a cookie expiry date
        Returns:
        criteria that checks/filters a browser cookie
        See Also:
        Cookie.getExpiry()

      • cookieExpiryAfter

        public static ru.tinkoff.qa.neptune.core.api.steps.Criteria<org.openqa.selenium.Cookie> cookieExpiryAfter​(java.util.Date after)
        The checking of a browser cookie. It is used to filter cookies by expiry date.
        Parameters:
        after - is lower border of a cookie expiry date
        Returns:
        criteria that checks/filters a browser cookie
        See Also:
